Rulings.Tengu:
If a monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, change that monster to face-up Attack Position at the end of the Damage Step if your attacking monster is Reptile-Type.
‚óèThe effect to change the Battle Position of a Defense Position monster targets that monster. The attacking monster must be Reptile-Type during damage calculation for this effect to apply.
